text: Demographics (2020) White Black Native Asian 78.8% 3.3% 0.2% 8.2% Islander Other Mixed Hispanic (any race) 0.04% 2.8% 6.7% 7.5% Glen Ellyn is a village in DuPage County, Illinois, United States. It is a suburb of Chicago. The village had a population of 28,846 as of the 2020 Census. ==References== Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Settlements in DuPage County, Illinois
title: Glen Ellyn, Illinois
